data.title: Village Roadshow Theme Park Pass
data.text:
Highlights

Visit 3 Gold Coast theme parks

Entry to Warner Bros. Movie World, Sea World & Wet 'n' Wild

Daily shows & presentations

Perfect for all the family

Description

A trip to the Gold Coast wouldn't be complete without visiting one of the top theme parks in Australia! Book a 3, 7 or 14 day theme park pass to gain entry to Warner Bros. Movie World, Sea World & Wet 'n' Wild over your chosen days.

Warner Bros. Movie World

Immerse yourself in Movie World and become lost in a world of fun and fantasy, meeting superheroes and your favourite movie stars. With multiple exhibitions, you can go behind the scenes of blockbuster motion pictures or enjoy a thrill on the many rides on offer.

Sea World

Visit the premier marine animal park in Australia, offering rides, animal exhibitions and more. Enjoy one of the many shows including the Affinity Dolphin presentation, penguin feeding and more. There are also thrilling rides for the whole family to enjoy.

Wet 'n' Wild

For a great day of water, sun and fun, head to Wet 'n' Wild to cool down on their exhilarating water slides! Offering some of the tallest and fastest water slides in Australia Wet 'n' Wild will get your heart racing!

Trip Includes

3, 7 or 14 consecutive days entry into Warner Bros. Movie World, Sea World & Wet 'n' Wild

Duration

Allow 3, 7 or 14 days

Departures

Open daily between 9.30am & 5pm

Sea World is located at Seaworld Dr, Main Beach

Wet 'n' Wild & Warner Bros. Movie World are located at Pacific Mwy, Oxenford

Operates daily all year (Wet 'n' Wild currently closed Monday-Wednesday)

Other Information
